title: Check E-file Status
description: A taxpayer wants to know if their e-filed return has been accepted by the IRS.

tasks.description: Retrieve the submission ID for the taxpayer's e-filed return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the unique identifier for the tax return submission.

tasks.description: Check the status of the submission with the IRS e-file system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's query returns a status of 'Accepted'.

tasks.description: Inform the taxpayer that their return has been successfully accepted by the IRS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the good news to the taxpayer.
